translation.en: Let's do it. Chrissy! It's time for your…
Get back here, you little hubcap! It's…
[Mama] All right, you've got nowhere to go!
Let's all just go home and take a nice, warm bath.
translation.fr: Rentrons prendre un bon bain chaud.

translation.en: Stay on her tail. I'll cut her off at the pass!
translation.fr: Suis-la. Je la coupe au col !

translation.en: Huh? Why aren't you in school? Why aren't you at work?
translation.fr:
- Tu n'es pas à l'école ?
- Tu n'es pas au travail ?

translation.en: I got ya! I got ya! I…
You fall for that every time.
Another peaceful day in Bumperton Hills.
translation.fr: Une autre journée paisible à Tut-Tut Land.

translation.en: Bath time? Bath time. Good luck!
translation.fr:
- L'heure du bain ?
- Oui. Bonne chance !

translation.en: Tub's almost full. All right, Chrissy.
translation.fr:
- Le bain est prêt.
- Très bien.

translation.en: Come on. It's your turn to take a bath. Then me next!
translation.fr:
- C'est à toi de prendre un bain.
- Ensuite, à moi !

translation.en: Maybe you could teach Chrissy to love baths too.

translation.fr: Il fait sombre. Je vois rien.

translation.en: Choppy water, choppy water, choppy water.
[gasps] I know! Close your eyes and pretend real hard.
translation.fr: Je sais ! Ferme les yeux et fais semblant.

translation.en: Hey, Chrissy. You look so cute bouncing on that trampoline.
translation.fr:
Bonjour ! Tu es adorable
sur ce trampoline.

translation.en: Of course. Chrissy. You are just the cutest thing ever!
translation.fr:
Bien sûr.
Chrissy, tu es la plus adorable !

translation.en: What you doin'? Blowin' dandelions? Makin' wishes?
translation.fr:
Tu souffles des pissenlits ?
Tu fais des vœux ?

translation.en: You are just the cutest thing ever!
-[Bobby blowing] -Keep trying, little guy. You can do it.
Looks like someone needs some holdin'.
Oh, I-- I don't know that song.
translation.fr: Je ne connais pas cette chanson.

translation.en: Uh, this is all so very cute.
[Carley] That is the cutest thing ever!
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais rien vu de si adorable !

translation.en: Well, you see, my dad was gonna throw it out, but I saved it.
translation.fr:
Mon père allait le jeter,
mais je l'ai sauvé.

translation.en: Because it reminded me of you.
translation.fr: Il m'a fait penser à toi.

translation.en: Wanna go help me add it to my gallery space?
translation.fr: Tu veux m'aider à l'ajouter à ma galerie ?

translation.en: Here you go, Chrissy. I got you a special treat.
Nice try, but raisins are good for you,
and makes Mommy feel better about that milkshake I gave you yesterday.
translation.fr:
et mieux que le milk-shake
que je t'ai donné hier.

translation.en: Chasing a cookie in a jar, I see.
translation.fr: Tu pistes un cookie dans un bocal.

translation.en: I remember the first time I chased a sugary snack.
translation.fr:
Je me souviens
de ma première chasse au sucre.

translation.en: Fastest crumb cake I ever-- Don't mean to be rude, but I'm going left. Bye!
translation.fr:
Le gâteau le plus rapide…
Je vais à gauche. Au revoir !

translation.en: Bye, Mr. Coaltrain! Hope you catch your cookie!
translation.fr:
- Au revoir, M. Boute-en-train.
- Bonne chance !

translation.en: Hey, kids. Who wants a healthy snack?
translation.fr:
Salut, les enfants.
Qui veut un bon goûter sain ?

translation.en: I-- I don't have any cookies!
Please don't eat me! I'm not as sweet as I look!
translation.fr:
Ne me mange pas !
Je ne suis pas si sucrée que ça !

translation.en: You ate all your raisins! Good job, Chrissy.
translation.fr:
Tu as mangé tes raisins secs !
Bravo, Chrissy.

translation.en: I think you deserve a cookie.

translation.fr:
- Le dernier cookie aux raisins secs.
- Raisins secs ?

translation.en: ♪ Baby Unicar! Colors so bright! Travels the uni-- ♪
translation.fr:
Bébé Limoucorne ! Aux couleurs vives !
Il vole dans…

translation.en: Now, you know we don't draw on the wall…
translation.fr: On ne dessine pas sur le mur…

translation.en: Aw. Wait. [blubbers] No. No drawing on the wall.
translation.fr: Attends. Non, pas de dessin sur le mur.

translation.en: That is not what I meant! Chrissy, I'm warning you.
translation.fr: Pas comme ça ! Chrissy, je te préviens.

translation.en: Okay, you need to stay on the couch until time out is over.
translation.fr: Reste sur le canapé tant que tu es punie.

translation.en: I'm setting this timer for five minutes.
You can get up when the face goes from sad to happy. I'll be just in the other room.
translation.fr:
Tu pourras te lever quand il sourira.
Je serai à côté.

translation.en: ♪ Travels the universe Making wrongs right ♪
translation.fr:
Il vole dans l'univers
Toujours sur le qui-vive

translation.en: Stay on the couch until time out is over.
translation.fr: Sur le canapé jusqu'à la fin.

translation.en: Yes! Baby Unicar! ♪ Travels the universe making-- ♪
translation.fr:
- Oui ! Bébé Limoucorne !
- Il vole dans l'uni…
Pas de télé quand on est puni.

translation.en: Well, at least it comes off easy.

translation.fr: Mon coffre n'est pas si gros.

translation.en: -No, you see, Chrissy, I was just-- -That's it! Time out!
translation.fr:
- Chrissy, je…
- Ça suffit, tu es puni !

translation.en: Don't leave couch until sad to happy.
translation.fr: Reste sur le canapé jusqu'au sourire.

translation.en: Uh, Chrissy, you set it for an hour.
-[Mama] Where to next, everybody? -Last one to the ball pit's a rusty car!
translation.fr: Et maintenant ? Le dernier aux balles est rouillé !

translation.en: Are you two eyeing that big Baby Unicar toy?
One hundred tickets is a lot, but it's worth it 'cause it's our last one.
translation.fr:
Cent tickets, c'est cher,
mais ça les vaut, c'est le dernier.

translation.en: New high score! Tickets, tickets, tickets.
[attendant over PA] Hey, Mike's Carcaders. Last chance to bring your tickets in to exchange them for a prize!
translation.fr:
Écoutez tous. Il est temps
d'échanger vos tickets contre un prix !

translation.en: Enjoy your banana, Chrissy! Oh no!
translation.fr:
- T'as la banane, Chrissy !
- Oh, non !

translation.en: Hey, you two. What prizes can I get you today?
Whoa! Okay. I'm gonna go count these up.
Sorry, guys. You both only have 50 tickets each. Pencils are all you can get.
translation.fr:
Désolée, pour 50 tickets,
vous n'avez droit qu'à un crayon.

translation.en: Maybe if you put your tickets together, you could share the Baby Unicar toy?
translation.fr:
Si vous groupez vos tickets,
vous pourriez partager Bébé Limoucorne ?

translation.en: Chrissy best hide and seeker. -She is pretty good. -Mm-hmm.
Well, we'll see who's the best. Now it's my turn to seek and I'm gonna find you all in no time.
translation.fr:
Voyons qui est le meilleur.
À moi de vous trouver, ce sera vite fait.

translation.en: Chrissy, if I can't find you, you can have cookies for dinner.
translation.fr:
Si je ne te trouve pas,
tu auras des cookies.

translation.en: Ready or not, here I come!
Come out, come out, wherever you are!
-I thought you'd never find me here. -[Papa chuckles]
-If we split up, we can cover more ground. -Good idea.
translation.fr:
- On devrait se séparer.
- Bonne idée.
Papa ! Tu as trouvé quelque chose ?

translation.en: -[Cory] It came from the closet! -Chrissy, they're coming!
translation.fr:
- C'était quoi ?
- Le placard ! Ils arrivent !

translation.en: [scoffs] Looks like they found us, Chrissy.
Looks like Chrissy's better than you thought. What? She just got lucky! We'll find her.
translation.fr:
- Elle est meilleure que tu le pensais.
- Elle a de la chance ! On la trouvera.

translation.en: -What? -Freddie, why are you in my house?
I'm playing hide and seek with Kimmy and Timmy. They'll never find me here.
translation.fr:
Je joue à cache-cache
avec Kimmy et Timmy. Ils m'auront pas.

translation.en: -What should we do? -I don't know where else to look.
Okay, you win! Chrissy, you're the best at hide and seek!
translation.fr:
OK, Chrissy est la meilleure
à cache-cache !

- Chrissy me fait peur parfois.
- Moi aussi.

translation.en: Whoa, you keep jumping like that and there won't be any water left!
translation.fr:
Continue comme ça
et il n'y aura plus d'eau !

translation.en: Time to head home, Chrissy. Say goodbye to Catalina.
translation.fr: On rentre. Dis au revoir à Catalina.

translation.en: Okay, just one more. I'm gonna say goodbye to Cat's mom.
translation.fr:
Bon, juste une.
Je dis au revoir à la mère de Cat.

- Pas de boulet ?
- Il te faut…

translation.en: Those kids just love being in the water.
-Nice circle! -How are we gonna make this triangle?
translation.fr:
- Joli cercle !
- Et pour le triangle ?

- Je peux pas m'arrêter.
- Oh, non.

translation.en: Can we please have crumpets for dinner?
translation.fr: On peut manger des crêpes ce soir ?

translation.en: -All right, see you next week. -See you then.
translation.fr:
- À la semaine prochaine.
- À plus.

translation.en: [Papa] Hmm, now it just needs a really funny joke.
Let's see what's on the internet.
[Papa] ♪ A great idea will come to me ♪
Ooh, someone commented on my new profile pic!
translation.fr: On a commenté ma nouvelle photo.

translation.en: I should probably take a power nap before lunch.
Get off my bumper, Bobby. Are we doing it or not?
translation.fr:
Lâche-moi, le pare-chocs, Bobby.
On le fait ou pas ?

translation.en: [Mama] …additional concrete to support the new structure. Oh, hold on, Julia, I need to take this call.
translation.fr:
Il faut soutenir la nouvelle structure.
Julia, je dois répondre.

translation.en: Hi, hon, it's me, Papa. Have you seen my snuggle socks?
translation.fr:
Salut.
Tu as vu mes chaussettes douillettes ?

translation.en: Top drawer. Wait, are you about to take a nap?
translation.fr: Tiroir du haut. Tu vas faire une sieste ?

translation.en: I'm back. Let's open the blueprints and take a look at the foundation.
translation.fr:
Je suis de retour.
Regardons les fondations.

translation.en: One and a two and a three, four, five.
Nap time is over! Time to roll!
translation.fr:
- La sieste est finie !
- Je file !

translation.en: [grunts] You're getting so big. Don't you grow up too fast, okay?
translation.fr:
Tu es si grande.
Ne grandis pas trop vite, d'accord ?

translation.en: -Wait. Did you just wink at yourself? -Yep.
translation.fr:
- Tu as fait un clin d'œil ?
- Oui.

translation.en: I just need to draw a perfectly straight line.
translation.fr: Je dois juste tracer une ligne droite.
Oui. On y est presque. Oui…

translation.en: Ah! Oh, Chrissy. You scared me.
Do you have a case of the hiccups?
I have just the thing. Drink some water.
translation.fr: Je sais quoi faire. Bois de l'eau.

translation.en: Oh, I know. Let's try this.
Now take a drink of water.
I'm just helping Chrissy cure her hiccups.
Oh. Well, I have an idea.
My mom always gave me a spoonful of sugar to cure my hiccups.
translation.fr: Ma mère me donnait toujours du sucre.

translation.en: I don't know if that'll work. Papa, let's try.
translation.fr:
- Je ne sais pas si ça marchera.
- Papa, essayons.

translation.en: Salt? Maybe mustard? Not vinegar. Pickle juice didn't work.
translation.fr:
Sel ? Moutarde ?
Pas du vinaigre. Ni du jus de cornichons.

translation.en: No, we're just trying to get rid of Chrissy's hiccups.
translation.fr: Non, on aide Chrissy avec son hoquet.

translation.en: Oh, my mom has a neat trick for that.
You just have to hold your breath for ten seconds.
-[hiccups] -Oh, Chrissy! Do you have the hiccups?
translation.fr: Oh, Chrissy ! Tu as le hoquet ?

translation.en: A good laugh always gets rid of them for me. What do you call a sick train?
translation.fr:
Le rire en vient à bout.
Comment on appelle un train malade ?

translation.en: The best way to get rid of hiccups is by scaring them away.
translation.fr:
Le meilleur truc contre le hoquet,
c'est la peur.

translation.en: When I get the hiccups, I fly corkscrews through the air. That always helps.
translation.fr:
Contre le hoquet
je fais des pirouettes dans l'air.

translation.en: You'll just have to bounce them out.
-My mom gave me a spoonful of sugar-- -Yeah, we tried that.
translation.fr:
- Ma mère me donnait du sucre…
- On a essayé.

translation.en: This mask will definitely scare those hiccups out of Chrissy.
I knew laughter would do the trick.
translation.fr: Je savais que le rire aiderait.

translation.en: Look at me! Look at me!
Hot chocolate. Get your hot chocolate here! What a nice day to go sledding.
translation.fr:
- Qui veut un chocolat chaud ?
- Parfaite journée pour la luge.

translation.en: Whoa, slow down, Chrissy. Wait for me.
Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Uh, Chrissy, people say the best part of sledding is actually the view.
translation.fr:
On dit que le mieux avec la luge,
c'est la vue.

translation.en: Why don't we just stay up here and get some hot chocolate?
translation.fr:
Et si on restait là
avec un chocolat chaud ?

translation.en: Chrissy! Wait, wait, wait. No! No! No! No!
I think that's my dad. Your dad is Santa?
translation.fr:
- Je crois que c'est mon père.
- Ton père est le père Noël ?

translation.en: [Papa chuckles] You know what? The best part of sledding really is the view.
translation.fr:
Tu sais quoi ?
Le mieux avec la luge, c'est la vue.

translation.en: Huh? Sorry, Chrissy, I can't. I have a lot of work to do.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas. J'ai du travail.

translation.en: Oh, maybe you could go play with Mama and Cory?
translation.fr: Tu pourrais jouer avec maman et Cory ?

translation.en: -We're actually in the middle of a game. -Yeah, ages five and up.
translation.fr:
- On joue déjà à un jeu.
- Oui, cinq ans et plus.

translation.en: -Maybe you can play with Papa? -Papa no play time.
translation.fr:
- Tu pourrais jouer avec papa ?
- Il peut pas.

La super télécommande
qui marche sur les gens.

translation.en: It lets you control someone like you control the TV. Watch. Hey, Cory!
translation.fr:
La super télécommande
qui marche sur les gens. - Regarde. Cory !
- C'est la super télécommande ?

translation.en: Oh, hey, is that super remote?
translation.fr:
- Regarde. Cory !
- C'est la super télécommande ?

translation.en: But the rule is that you have to play along no matter what. Play!
translation.fr:
Mais on est obligés de jouer
quoi qu'il arrive. Lecture !

translation.en: …years. I remember the fun we used to…
translation.fr: … des années. On adorait jouer à ça.

translation.en: Hey! Who put this banana in my card pile?
translation.fr: Qui a mis cette banane sur mes cartes ?

translation.en: You never do stuff like that to me, do you?
translation.fr: Tu ne me fais jamais ça, j'espère ?
Lecture. … de ça ? Ne t'en sers pas sur moi.

translation.en: Just don't use it on me, okay?
translation.fr: … de ça ? Ne t'en sers pas sur moi.

translation.en: Huh? Where did my pencil go?
Very funny, but I need to get back to work.
translation.fr: Très drôle, mais je dois travailler.

translation.en: This comic is gonna take forever to finish.
translation.fr: Cette BD va prendre une éternité.

translation.en: Done. Bye, Mr. Pencil! I'm hungry. Time for a snack! See you later, Chrissy!
translation.fr:
Fini. Au revoir, crayon !
J'ai faim. À plus !

translation.en: Hi, whatcha doing? Making nachos? None for me. Ketchup. Corn. Pan. No.
translation.fr:
Tu fais quoi ? Des nachos ?
Pas pour moi. Ketchup. Maïs…

translation.en: -Nothing like a cold glass of juice! -Pause.
translation.fr:
- Rien de tel qu'un jus !
- Pause.

- Lecture.
- Il y en a partout !

translation.en: -You two look like you're having fun. -Mama, play time!
translation.fr:
- Vous avez l'air de vous amuser.
- Maman, joue !

translation.en: I can't. I gotta get back to my game.
translation.fr: Je joue déjà à un jeu.

translation.en: Looks like I'm in control now.
-Play. Pause. Play. Pause. Play. -Mama, what are you doing?
translation.fr:
- Lecture, pause, lecture…
- Tu fais quoi ?

translation.en: We're still playing! Papa, do something!
translation.fr:
On joue encore !
Papa, fais quelque chose !

translation.en: [Cory] Come on, Chrissy. You've had your fun.
Time to get back to work.
Well, I guess no more super remote.
Look, everyone! It's the saltshaker of madness!
translation.fr: Regardez ! La salière de la folie !

translation.en: If you get hit by the magic salt, you turn into a monster!
translation.fr:
Si on est touché par le sel,
on devient un monstre !

translation.en: Okay, so I think we have all the resources we need.
translation.fr: On a tout ce qu'il nous faut.
Tu as raison. Quelque chose pue.

translation.en: I've got some work to do though. Do you think you can take care of it?
translation.fr:
Mais j'ai du travail.
Tu peux t'en occuper ?

translation.en: All right, I'm back. Let's raid this dungeon!
translation.fr: Je suis là. Explorons ce donjon !

translation.en: Presenting… The Gary Garbage Truck Perfume.
translation.fr:
- Voici…
- Le parfum poubelle de Gary Big Benne.

translation.en: Guaranteed to make you smell like the greatest garbage truck in the world.
translation.fr:
Pour être le camion-poubelle
le mieux parfumé.

translation.en: I wouldn't go in there if I were you.
translation.fr: À ta place, je ne ferais pas ça.

translation.en: I don't know who used the bathroom last, but might just be best to, you know, let it air out.
translation.fr:
J'ignore qui sort des toilettes,
mais il vaudrait mieux attendre un peu.

translation.en: Yeah! We need to use the bathroom!
translation.fr: Oui ! On doit aller aux toilettes !

translation.en: Hey, Chrissy. I see you found the smell.
translation.fr: Je vois que tu as trouvé l'odeur.

translation.en: I knew you could do it.
Wait. What the… Where's the toilet?
[machine] Sorry, you lose again! Take one on the house.
translation.fr: Encore perdu. Un ticket de consolation.

translation.en: Here you go, boys. Thank you, Miss Fenderson. Enjoy yourself this evening.
translation.fr:
- Pour vous.
- Merci, Mlle Pare-brise. Bonne soirée.

translation.en: You need more than that if you wanna party with the high rollers.
translation.fr:
Il t'en faudra bien plus
pour te joindre à eux.

translation.en: [game] Sorry! Too bad! Sorry! Almost! Too bad!
Crispy! Combo! Awesome! Crispy! Combo! Perfect score!
translation.fr:
Bravo ! Combo ! Génial !
Bravo ! Combo ! Score parfait !

translation.en: Chrissy lucky? You got a lucky penny. Better hang onto it.
translation.fr:
- Chrissy chanceuse ?
- Une pièce porte-bonheur ! Garde-la.

translation.en: Good luck fishing today, Squint. Ha! Luck's got nothing to do with it.
translation.fr:
- Bonne chance à la pêche, Squint.
- La chance n'a rien à voir.

translation.en: I finally got the white whale!
[announcer] Welcome to the 65th annual Bumper-Ball Championship!
But first, a quick word from our sponsor.
I'm gonna go upstairs and do some work.
-You're gonna take a nap, aren't you? -What? No!
translation.fr:
- Tu vas faire une sieste ?
- Quoi ? Non !

translation.en: Morning, Chrissy. We're babysitting one of your friends today.
translation.fr:
Bonjour.
On garde un de tes amis aujourd'hui.

translation.en: I left a snack for you two on the table!
translation.fr: Vous avez un goûter sur la table !

translation.en: We've got the match of the century here today, folks!
It's the long-awaited showdown between two fated rivals.
translation.fr: La confrontation de deux grands rivaux.

translation.en: The Mean Green Machines versus the Tin Can Vans!
translation.fr:
Les Méchants Verts
contre les Vans de conserve !

translation.en: Who will take the win? Who will come out on top?
The Tin Can Vans have snatched the ball from the offense.
translation.fr: Les Vans de conserve ont pris la balle.

translation.en: They are headed downfield. Look at that fancy wheel work.
translation.fr:
Ils s'approchent du but.
Regardez ces roues !

translation.en: And goal! It's a goal for the Tin Can Vans!
translation.fr: But pour les Vans de conserve !

translation.en: The Mean Greens are left in shock. But they don't leave them a second to celebrate.
translation.fr:
Les Verts sont sous le choc.
Mais ils se reprennent vite.

translation.en: Both teams are scrambling. I can barely see the ball, folks! It's lost in the scuffle.
translation.fr:
Je ne vois plus la balle !
Perdue dans la bagarre.

translation.en: It's been found. The Mean Greens have the ball. We're off to the races! What a beautiful maneuver.
translation.fr:
Trouvée ! Les Méchants Verts l'ont.
C'est la course ! Bien joué.

translation.en: Go, Mean Greens! Show 'em who's boss!
Ah-ha! And it's a goal for Green!
The Vans manage to break away! It looks like a clean--
translation.fr: Les Vans s'échappent ! On dirait que…

translation.en: Wait a minute. What just happened?
A fan has come onto the field. He's stolen the ball! -Huh? -Can someone get stadium security, please?
translation.fr:
Un fan est sur le terrain.
Il a volé la balle ! Appelez la sécurité !

translation.en: Can no one get their tires on the slippery suspect?
translation.fr: Peut-on bloquer les roues du suspect ?

translation.en: Oh, they got him. The fan is down! They're really giving him a walloping!
translation.fr:
Ils l'ont eu. Le fan est à terre !
Ils lui fichent une raclée !

translation.en: The match is heating up. There's no sign of it slowing down. I'm working!
translation.fr:
- Ça chauffe. Aucun ralentissement.
- Je travaille !

translation.en: They're matching point for point. And those victory dances are nothing to sneeze at.
translation.fr:
La lutte est intense.
Ces danses victorieuses sont épatantes.

translation.en: The walls are closing in. There's nowhere left to turn.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont nulle part où aller.

translation.en: But wait! A teammate is wide open. Waiting in the wings like an angel.
translation.fr:
Un coéquipier est disponible.
Une apparition.

translation.en: A beautiful pass. And beautifully received.
translation.fr: Une belle passe. Et joliment reçue.

translation.en: Vamos, Mean Greens! Vamos, Tin Cans!
It's all come down to this. One final goal will decide the match.
translation.fr: Un but final décidera du match.

translation.en: With seconds on the clock, who will take the championship title?
translation.fr:
Dans quelques secondes,
qui remportera le titre ?

translation.en: It's another mad scramble. The play goes haywire.
translation.fr:
Une autre course folle. Les joueurs sont
les quatre roues en l'air.

translation.en: Cars are sent head over wheels.
translation.fr:
Les joueurs sont
les quatre roues en l'air.

translation.en: The ball is in the air. It's anyone's game.
translation.fr: La balle est en l'air. Rien n'est joué.

translation.en: It's all over, folks! It's a tie!
translation.fr: C'est fini ! Ils sont ex æquo !
Ex æquo ? C'est à la cerise ?

translation.en: Oh, look at you two having so much fun together.
translation.fr: Vous vous amusez bien, tous les deux.

translation.en: Oh, there's only one left. I'll go get some cups so we can split it.
translation.fr: Il n'en reste qu'un. On va le partager.

translation.en: We wouldn't leave you hanging, folks! The match moves into overtime. Winner takes all!
translation.fr:
On passe aux prolongations.
Le gagnant l'emportera !

translation.en: Okay. This goes in here. And this…
translation.fr: Bien. Ça va ici. Et ça…

translation.en: Hop on out of that box, please.
We used to make home movies of you and Cory with this all the time.
translation.fr:
On faisait des films
de Cory et toi tout le temps.

translation.en: [Papa] Here we go! Hi, Chrissy. Say hi to the camera!
translation.fr:
C'est parti !
Chrissy, dis bonjour à la caméra !

translation.en: Okay, that was fun. Now I need to get back to--
translation.fr: C'était sympa. Je dois continuer à…

translation.en: I just have so much to do.
translation.fr: J'ai tellement de choses à faire.

translation.en: [Mama] Can you see the kids? [Papa] Yeah. There's Cory, walking down the hill.
translation.fr:
- Tu vois les enfants ?
- Oui, Cory descend.

translation.en: Now, when you're hunting a ghost, you have to be very quiet.
translation.fr:
Quand on chasse un fantôme,
il faut être discret.

translation.en: [Mama] Oh, Chrissy's first restaurant! And what would Madame like to order?
translation.fr:
- Le premier restaurant de Chrissy !
- Et que veut commander madame ?
Elle veut aller sur le pot !

translation.en: [Mama laughs] That's right! And what do puppy cars do?
translation.fr: C'est ça ! Et que font les chiots ?

translation.en: Now I wonder, who could have made all of this mess?
translation.fr: Je me demande qui a mis tout ce bazar.

translation.en: That's still our Chrissy. Well, I think that was all of them.
translation.fr: Et ça aussi. Je crois que c'est tout.

translation.en: Aw, you excited for Mama and Papa to get home, Cory?
translation.fr: Tu as hâte que maman et papa rentrent ?

translation.en: Cory, let them through the door! Here, let me grab your bags, dear.
translation.fr:
Cory, laisse-les passer !
Laisse-moi prendre les valises.

translation.en: Oh, thanks, Mom. [Cory] I wanna see! Let me see!
Cory, meet your new baby sister, Chrissy.
translation.fr: Voici ta nouvelle petite sœur, Chrissy.

translation.en: I'm gonna show her my toys!
[Papa's mom] These really are special times.
And they go by so fast.
Mama go back to work now?
How about I hide and you seek?
translation.fr: Et si on jouait à cache-cache ?
